Health Questionnaire Acknowledgment and Consent to Proceed

  1. I declare that I am well acquainted with the Doctors providing me with the treatment in this Seminar/Clinic/Retreat and the said treatment is provided to me after informing me about the same completely and obtaining my consent for the same.
  2. I am satisfied with the treatment provided to me and I declare that I shall not question the same or create any dispute for the results that I shall gain out of the said treatment.
  3. I have given my free consent for the medical consultation at this Seminar/Clinic/Retreat and I shall never initiate any legal dispute for the said medical consultation sought by me.
  4. I declare that the doctors have given their complete genuine efforts towards my treatment and I completely understand that no doctor/scan give any guarantee in respect of human treatment model.
  5. I undertake & agree to pay the fees chargeable for my treatment as per the planned fees structure and further agree to pay interest @ % over the amount remaining due against me towards the said treatment.
  6. I further undertake not to claim or demand any refund of fees paid by me as per the policy.
  7. During the sessions of my treatment or retreat by Advanced Health / Dr. Ravi Vairagade & Team I shall be obliged by all the terms and conditions and I shall never hold any doctor guilty for any unforeseen events that may occur during the course of said treatment.
  8. I am fully satisfied with the ability of doctor, methods of treatment, terms and conditions of treatment, fees structure etc. at Advanced Health / Dr. Ravi Vairagade & Team and shall never raise any dispute in respect of the same as I have agreed for the same by free consent.
